Author: gcharang#6833
Content: @Werxadler I am not aware of any restriction on maximum number of orders

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: are your orders showing now?

Author: Werxadler#6422
Content: @gcharang i mean i set 11 orders with my max amount of morty and rick vs different coins, on other exchanges you can only set 1 order, i am pretty sure i red somewhere at atomicdex you can set 5 different orders... Still all my orders dissapeared

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
yes, this is a feature called "liquidity multiplier"
same coins can be offered for different trades and all the offers are valid till atleast one offer is accepted by someone else
then the rest of the offers for the same coins should disappear

do you think something like the above caould have happened to your orders?
i.e., 2 trades matched. one for rick and other for morty; which made all the other offers invalid

Author: Werxadler#6422
Content: Meanwhile 1 order got filled, my orderbook was empty at that moment though

Author: cipi#4502
Content: @goldenman yes, in a swap that involves ERC20 tokens both maker and taker need to pay gasfees at different stages of the swap
